field.label: Creator(s)
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of the creator(s) of this item.
field.required: You must enter the creator of the item

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Publication Date
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Creation Date
field.hint: If you know when this item was created, please give the date.

field.label: Resource Type
field.hint: Select the resource type(s) of the main content of the item (hold Ctrl/Cmd while clicking to select multiple subjects).
field.required: You must choose one or multiple resource types

field.label: Subject
field.hint: Please select a subject tag that describes the primary topic for this item.

field.label: Subject (Other)
field.hint: Please enter a custom subject tag.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Describe this item in detail: Overarching aims for the resource; Expand on the learning outcomes and topics addressed; Mention data sets used or studies referred to; Whether the resource forms part of a larger set of related resources.

field.label: Summary
field.hint: Please provide a one line summary of the above description that would be most useful for someone browsing your resource. This is used as the short blurb shown in search results. E.g.: "This web visualization demonstrates the concept of a sampling distribution of an estimate, using the example of a mean of a Normally distributed variable."

field.label: Pre-requisite Knowledge
field.hint: Please list one prerequisite at a time (press the "Add More" button to add more entries). Some examples of pre-requisites are "familiarity with interpreting histograms" and "central limit theorem".

field.label: Learning Objectives
field.hint: Please list one objective at a time (press the "Add More" button to add more entries).
field.required: Please enter learning objectives for this item.

field.label: Related Materials
field.hint: Please list one related material at a time (press the "Add More" button to add more entries).

field.label: Suggested Uses, Tips and Discoveries
field.hint: Information that will help others to use this material. Also includes lessons you've learned from using this material in practice, e.g.: what worked, what didn't, what was particularly difficult, etc.

field.label: Access Restriction
field.hint: You may make this entire submission instructor-only, only instructors will know this submission exists. Alternatively, if you choose to let everyone access this submission, you may configure individual files to be instructor-only in the Upload step.
field.required: You must choose an access level.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item.

field.label: Available in Alternative Languages
field.hint: If this resource is available in other languages, please list the languages here.
